channel.title: Backtracking on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Backtracking on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 40 Combination Sum II
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 40 Question Given a collection of candidate numbers (candidates) and a target number (target), find all unique combinations in candidates where the candidate numbers sum to target.

item.title: Problem 131 Palindrome Partitioning
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 131 Question Given a string s, partition s such that every substring of the partition is a palindrome.

item.title: Problem 78 Subsets
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 78 Question Given an integer array nums of unique elements, return all possible subsets (the power set).

item.title: Problem 1863 Sum of All Subset XOR Totals
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1863 Question The XOR total of an array is defined as the bitwise XOR of all its elements, or 0 if the array is empty.

item.title: Problem 1219 Path With Maximum Gold
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1219 Question In a gold mine grid of size m x n, each cell in this mine has an integer representing the amount of gold in that cell, 0 if it is empty.
